syntheses: The FY2019 cash conversion cycle (CCC) for General Mills is 33.33 days. DIO (Days Inventory Outstanding) is 22.22 days, DSO (Days Sales Outstanding) is 44.44 days, and DPO (Days Payable Outstanding) is 33.33 days. This is calculated by taking the average inventory between FY2018 and FY2019 (1,492.3) and dividing it by the FY2019 COGS (11,678.7), then multiplying by 365. This gives us a DIO of 22.22 days. Next, we take the average accounts receivable between FY2018 and FY2019 (1,679.7) and divide it by the FY2019 revenue (18,127.0), then multiply by 365. This gives us a DSO of 44.44 days. Finally, we take the average accounts payable between FY2018 and FY2019 (2,854.1) and divide it by the FY2019 COGS (11,678.7 + (1,559.3 - 1,426.3)), then multiply by 365. This gives us a DPO of 33.33 days. Adding DIO and DSO and subtracting DPO gives us a CCC of 33.33 days.
